name: NextSeasons
0:
”Alexa, ask next seasons, when is the next summer”
”next spring”
”last winter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: next seasons
des:
With this skill Alexa knows the number of days, hours and minutes and the date of the next start of an upcoming season. 
In addition you can get the begin of past season. More seasons can be requested without restarting the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
